metadata.Title: CVE-2015-1419 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - low.
metadata.Description:
Unspecified vulnerability in vsftpd 3.0.2 and earlier allows remote attackers to bypass access restrictions via unknown vectors, related to deny_file parsing.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2015-1419` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

vsftpd - 3.0.2-18ubuntu1
No subscription required

notes.Note: mdeslaur> man page says this isn't a security feature

criterions.comment: vsftpd package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.0.2-18ubuntu1').
